Texts.Eng:
Swift and dangerous fox people. Able warriors.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  -^green;20^reset;% Hunger Drain, Health x^green;1.2^reset;
  +^green;10^reset;% Speed & Jump,
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% Ice, +^green;25^reset;% Shadow, +^green;10^reset;% Cosmic

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Lush,Primeval, Forest, Jungle, Rainforest, Tundra, and Snow^reset; biomes: Health and Defense x^green;1.1^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Dagger/Shortsword: +^green;3^reset;% Crit Chance
  Quarterstaff: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, Defense x^green;1.2^reset;
  Hammer/Mace: +^green;15^reset;% Stun Chance
  Melee Combos increase Defense per-strike
  ^orange;Perfect Blocks^reset; increase Defense(+^green;2^reset;) and damage(+^green;2^reset;%)

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;25^reset;% Fire
  Energy x^red;0.88^reset;
